main event: A pilot flying at 24,000 ft. observed a brilliant white light approach his aircraft while flying over the Atlantic Ocean.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 115 seconds,The white light approached to within 1/2 mile of the aircraft,The cockpit was brilliantly illuminated by the light,The object then suddenly disappeared,The report concluded the object was possibly a balloon or meteoric in nature.
witness description: Captain Edward Peterson (13 years rated pilot) and 1/LT Gaylon Overton (3 years rated pilot)
